name: DrillDrill: The Quest for Diamonds
description:
You are Drill Drill a little Drill in a big world. Your friends need diamond dust to keep them warm during winter and it is your task to get them. Dig down deep in the underground until you hit the red line. This line will bounce you back up to the ground but make sure you have enough bounce power to get back to the top or you will be lost down there forever. 

This is not the only danger you will find on your way down and back up you will come across bombs that will not leave you unscarred when you touch them.

Will you make it deep enough to claim the bigest of diamonds or will you get lost in the ground like many before you.

Rules:
- Use A and D to move left and right
- Use S to start digging down

Notes:
The game uses physics for movement so you will not instantly stop when above or below ground.
